original_text: And they departed quickly from the sepulchre with fear and great joy; and did run to bring his disciples word.
korean_text: 그 여자들이 무서움과 큰 기쁨으로 빨리 무덤을 떠나 제자들에게 알리려고 달음질할새

sentences.original_text: And they departed quickly from the sepulchre
and did run to bring his disciples word
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 제자들에게 말을 전하기 위해 달려갔더라
